en.title: FusiuonExcel's School Of Networking 1, 23rd - 24th May 2008, Empress Hotel, Sepang, Malaysia.
en.content:
FE’s School of Networking 1, 23rd – 24th May 2008, at the Empress Hotel, Sepang, Malaysia was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by 80 enthusiastic Leaders. The 2 Days 1 Night training program was conducted by Dr. B.N. Edwards, KS Lee (Founder & Marketing Director of FE) and Presidential Directors, KC Phoon and Rachel Thomas.

Topics covered include : -

- Mindset
- What is Networking?
- What is PAP? 8 Steps Presentation
- Prospecting Tools & Scripts - Role Play
- “Law of Averages” – Game
- Effective Marketing Plan Presentation – KC Phoon
- How to Service & Duplicate
- PAP’s to a Multi Million Organization – KS Lee
- Effective & Practical Ways to Service Members – Rachel Thomas
- The Mindset of a Multi Million Leader – KS Lee
- How I build a MultiMillion Organization – Rachel Thomas
- How I build a MultiMillion Organization – KC Phoon
- Goal Setting

The closing was provided by Paul Ting (Founder & CEO of FE) who talked on FE’s Vision and Strategies to build a world class Networking Marketing Company. It was a great learning and educational experience for all who attended. 

FE’s School of Networking is part of FE’s commitment and dedication to train and build FE’s members to become WORLD CLASS LEADERS with CONFIDENCE, RIGHT MINDSET and ATTITUDE to build a successful and sustainable GLOBAL business.

FE will be conducting more of the School of Networking for FE’s members in the near future.

See you all at the TOP!
